summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2782, for the improvement of Spokane Street, from 17th Avenue South to Alamo Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 33321 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
